Name: A Flicker of Light
About the game: NOW SUPPORTS ENGLISH! In this visual novel , experience the story of Ethan Syfran, who by an accident got him and his family caught in a whirlpool of crime in a catastrophe-swept world. How would he struggle to get out and save everything he cherished... or carry up all the sins he'd done and keep going? 'We shall meet in the place where there's no darkness.' Features An intense and perfectly paced story: Enjoy this visual novel with more than 150,000 words, within 8-10 hours of playthrough time, yet the breath-taking plot often forced the readers to finish it non-stop. Dystopian settings: Immerse yourself in the suffocating atmosphere of a dystopian world, with heart-pounding thrills. Vibrant Visuals: The backgrounds & illustrations brought to you by talented illustrators all around the world would never let you down. Interactive Dialogue Choices: During gameplay you can make choices that may to some extent influence the characters' actions and the story's endings. Amazing Soundtrack: All pieces of music tracks in the game are carefully chosen by the director, making sure they fit into even the most emotional scenes.
